  • Uses of NonPlayerCharacter in CharacterSystems

    Methods in CharacterSystems that return NonPlayerCharacter
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static NonPlayerCharacter
    EntityComponentGenerator.iNeedACharacter()
    iNeedACharacter generates a NonPlayerCharacter object and populates the characterName field based on a random seed 0-9 by calling Random().
